code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useState}from"react";import{useEffect}from"react";import"./MediaQueries.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[selectedOption,setSelectedOption]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const currentPath=window.location.pathname;if(currentPath==="/"){setSelectedOption(1);}else if(currentPath==="/aboutme"){setSelectedOption(2);}},[]);const handleOptionClick=option=>{setSelectedOption(option===selectedOption?null:option);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"headerNavigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"no-underline ".concat(selectedOption===1?'selected':''),onClick:()=>handleOptionClick('Portfólio'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Portf\xF3lio"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/aboutme",className:"no-underline ".concat(selectedOption===2?'selected':''),onClick:()=>handleOptionClick('Sobre mim'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Sobre mim"})})})]})})});};export default Header;
